item.title: Garbage collectors are turning Africa’s largest slum into one of the world’s most bitcoin-friendly places
item.description: Bitcoin came to Soweto West via AfriBit Africa, a Kenyan fintech company, through its nonprofit initiative to improve financial inclusion.

item.title: U.K. remains Europe’s top spot for finance investment, EY says
item.description: Global investors also see London as the most attractive European city for financial services foreign investment over the coming year, according to EY.

item.title: Crimea, Once a Crossroad of Civilizations, Finds Itself Isolated and Under Attack
item.description: Mostly Russian visitors now cavort along its historic beaches, hoping to avoid the Ukrainian drones whizzing toward military targets.
